snippet.title: [ Half-Life 2 : MMod ] v3 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
This is my tribute to Half-Life franchise.

http://www.moddb.com/mods/hl2-ep2-enhased-mod/images/half-life-2-mmod-play-it-your-way

Mod Page : http://www.moddb.com/mods/hl2-ep2-enhased-mod
Patreon : https://www.patreon.com/GunshipMarkII
My Site : http://gunshipstuff.x10.mx/

I've been out for a long while, but far from being dead, v3 of HL2MMod is not only the most refined iteration, but it is the most stable and feature complete, even on this alpha development stage. I've spent several months working on this project from an absolute scratch, and for once I am extremely happy with how it's turning out. Happy times.

Expect more info on ModDB page soon, which will include full feature list and more story behind development of this project. And yeah, i do plan to release it in 2018, you have my word, it's been too long and, I, myself need to move on too. 

Once again, thanks to everyone who's supported me over these years, I never forget how kind some of you've been and I hold your kindness very close to my heart. I really need any support I can get at these trying times. Thank you.
